subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2010)
Television
lead_paragraph: After Joannie Rochette’s inspiring performance in Vancouver, the Canadian figure skater has decided to join the “Stars on Ice” tour and also to perform a tribute for her mother.
snippet: After Joannie Rochette’s inspiring performance in Vancouver, the Canadian figure skater has decided to join the “Stars on Ice” tour and also to perform a tribute for her mother.
